amendatorysection.para: Any firearm in the possession of a person in violation of section 28-1204 or 28-1204.01 shall be confiscated by a peace officer or other authorized law enforcement officer. Such firearm shall be held by the agency employing such officer until it no longer is required as evidence.

crossreference.para: Disposition of confiscated firearm, see section 28-1204.04.
